description:
If you want to organize an event or festival you need to submit an Event Plan to your license or permit officer. I will teach you what you need to include in your Event Plan.

This workshop is for you if you want to organize an event or festival and you need to convince your license or permit officer.

At the end of the workshop you will understand what is expected of you in order to plan and produce a successful event or festival. You will be able to write an comprehensive Event Plan that complies with the rules and regulations set by your local authorities.

Interviews with event and festival professionals will provide you with fantastic insight into an amazing industry!

This 13+ hour workshop is divided in 13 sections in which you will learn everything you need to include in your Event Plan. Subjects include:

* planning your event

* researching your audience

* permits, licenses & festival insurances

* event production

* site survey and site design

* health & safety aspects at your event

* risk assessments & capacity calculations

* environmental planning

The workshop is a combination of tutorials, presentations, exercises and interviews with event and festival professionals. Reading material such as the Event Safety Guide, the Guide to Safety at Sports Grounds and more are incorporated into the curriculum.

This workshop is for you if you are passionate about events and festivals, if you keep dreaming about organizing your own event, and for (aspiring) event producers!
title: How to plan a successful event: an easy guide
